CatDescriptText: image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 9, 1960, pg. A9, reads: "D.I.'s IN Green - The fashionable members of the club, whose efforts extend toward aiding the National Foundation (formerly for infantile paralysis), wore exotic green gowns at their Han. 3 fashion show-dance party at the New Arena, and ended the intriguing program by dancing ensemble. Left to right: Elayne Jones, Margaret W. Watson, pledge member Doryce H. Griffin, Pat Horsley, charter member, who came rom Philadelphia for the affair; Juanita Drake, Rubye Young Buchanan, Gloria Grate, Nellye Barron and president Gay DeHall.  The girls had their usual packed house. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of eight D. I. Club members, from left:  Elayne Jones, Margaret W. Watson, Doryce H. Griffin, Pat Horsley, charter member wearing light colored dress with pleated crinoline skirt, belt, and wide lapels, Juanita Drake, Ruby Young Buchanan, Gloria Golden Grate, Nellye Barron and Gay DeHall, standing on stage in the New Arena Supper Club for D.I.'s National Foundation benefit
